name: Engel
wikiSummary: Great track from Rammstein, questioning the wisdom of wanting to become an angel after death. With a video based around Robert Rodriguez's "From Dusk Till Dawn" and a very nifty catch in the chorus with the childlike voices blending in surprisingly well with Till's deep growling vocal. The female vocals were sung by Bobolina, singer of Bobo In The White Wooden Houses.
wikiText: Great track from Rammstein, questioning the wisdom of wanting to become an angel after death. With a video based around Robert Rodriguez's "From Dusk Till Dawn" and a very nifty catch in the chorus with the childlike voices blending in surprisingly well with Till's deep growling [but tuneful] vocal. The female vocals were sung by Bobolina, singer of Bobo In The White Wooden Houses.
